侃侃諤諤: (かんかんがくがく) - (yoji) outspoken; arguing (heatedly) what one believes in; insisting on something without restraint
來る: (くる) - to come (spatially or temporally)/to approach/to arrive; to come back/to do ... and come back; to come to be/to become/to get/to grow/to continue; to come from/to be caused by/to derive from; to come to (i.e. "when it comes to spinach ...")
例: (rei/tato) - example , custom, practice, habit, usual; said, aforementioned; instance, example, case, illustration, usage; precedent
例え: (たとえ) - (esp. 例え) example; (esp. 譬え, 喩え) simile/metaphor/allegory/fable/parable
例えて言うと: (たとえていうと) - figuratively speaking; metaphorically speaking; so to speak; to use a figure of speech
例えに言う: (たとえにいう) - to speak metaphorically
例えようもない: (たとえようもない) - beyond comparison; incomparable
例える: (たとえる) - to compare; to liken; to speak figuratively; to illustrate; to use a simile
例え様もない: (たとえようもない) - beyond comparison; incomparable
例え様も無い: (たとえようもない) - beyond comparison; incomparable
例になく: (れいになく) - contrary to one's habit; unusually
例によって: (れいによって) - as usual; as is one's habit
例によって例の如し: (れいによってれいのごとし) - as always; the same as it always is
例に洩れず: (れいにもれず) - no exception (to one's usual habits)
例に漏れず: (れいにもれず) - no exception (to one's usual habits)
例に無く: (れいになく) - contrary to one's habit; unusually
例の: (れいの) - the usual/as it always is; said/that (previously-mentioned person or object)/aforementioned/you-know-(who, what, etc.); in the usual way
例の件: (れいのけん) - the matter you have been talking about
例を引く: (れいをひく) - to cite an example
例を挙げる: (れいをあげる) - to cite an example
例外のない規則はない: (れいがいのないきそくはない) - (proverb) There is no rule without exceptions
例外の無い規則は無い: (れいがいのないきそくはない) - (proverb) There is no rule without exceptions
例外条件: (れいがいじょうけん) - exception condition
例外状態: (れいがいじょうたい) - exception condition
例大祭: (れいたいさい) - regularly held festival
例年: (れいねん) - average (normal, ordinary) year; every year/annually
例年になく: (れいねんになく) - unusually (compared to a typical year)
例年に無く: (れいねんになく) - unusually (compared to a typical year)
例式: (れいしき) - regular ceremony; established form
例文: (れいぶん) - example sentence; illustrative sentence; model sentence
例日: (れいじつ) - week day; ordinary day; appointed day
例祭: (れいさい) - regular festival; annual festival
例題: (れいだい) - example; exercise (for the reader)
侍: (ji/samurai) - waiter , warrior (esp. of military retainers of daimyos in the Edo period), samurai
侍する: (じする) - to wait upon; to serve
侍らす: (はべらす) - to wait upon; to serve
侍り: (はんべり) - to wait upon/to serve; to be; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to humbly do ...
侍八騎: (さむらいはっき) - eight mounted warriors; eight samurai on horseback
侍大将: (さむらいだいしょう) - samurai general (esp. during the Sengoku period)
侍女: (jijo) - dama de companhia, criada de dama, camareira
侍従職: (じじゅうしょく) - board of chamberlains
侍所: (さぶらいどころ) - (esp. さむらいどころ) Board of Retainers/Kamakura- and Muromachi-period government office; (esp. さぶらいどころ) samurai guard house (Heian and Kamakura periods)
侍者: (じしゃ) - attendant; valet; altar boy; acolyte
侍蟻: (サムライアリ) - Polyergus samurai (species of amazon ant)
侍衛長: (じえいちょう) - captain of the guard
侍講: (じこう) - tutor to a daimyo, etc.; tutor to the emperor or crown prince (Meiji period)
侑觴: (ゆうしょう) - urging one to drink more good wine during a banquet
侑食: (ゆうしょく) - assisting at dinner; dining with a superior
侘しい: (わびしい) - miserable; wretched; lonely; dreary; shabby; comfortless
侘と寂: (わびとさび) - taste for the simple and quiet; wabi and sabi
侘び: (わび) - the beauty to be found in poverty and simplicity; subdued taste; quiet refinement; sober refinement; wabi
侘びしい: (わびしい) - miserable; wretched; lonely; dreary; shabby; comfortless
侘びる: (わびる) - to be worried; to be grieved; to pine for
侘び寂び: (ワビサビ) - aesthetic sense in Japanese art emphasising quiet simplicity and subdued refinement
侘ぶ: (わぶ) - (v2b-k,vi)   to be worried; to be grieved; to pine for
侘ぶる: (わぶる) - (v2r-s,vi)   to be worried; to be grieved
侘住い: (わびずまい) - solitary life; wretched abode
侘寂: (ワビサビ) - aesthetic sense in Japanese art emphasising quiet simplicity and subdued refinement
